name: Holiday Bundle!
description:
1 - 8 oz. brown sugar scrub
2 - 8 oz. soy spray - your choice of scent
3 - 8 oz. soy kream - your choice of scent
4 - soy lip balm - your choice of flavor

This is a holiday package only - after ordering please add in your notes which scents/flavor you would like for the lotion, lip balm and spray!

This is an amazing deal - while supplies last!

name: A buyers favorite!!! Kreamie's coconut brown sugar scrub! **Now with raw honey**
description:
All organic, all natural! 

Kreamie's face & body sugar scrub! 

Organic ingredients:
Vanilla, coconut oil & brown sugar.

Are you looking to keep your face & body smooth and hydrated all day long, literally all day? Looking to remove all the dead, dry skin this winter without the hassle or expensive treatments? 

You've found it!! With these all natural ingredients your skin will thank you for the instantly hydrated, soft, smooth and glowing look. Organic oils deeply moisturize while anti-aging vitamins and antioxidants nourish. Improve dry, thickened, sun-damaged and problem-prone skin. It also reduces inflammation, promotes earlier removal of dry skin scales, and optimizes moisture retention. 

Extremely soft to the touch once washed off. If you are aware of the benefits of organic coconut oil, you will fall in love with this scrub!!

Massage into your face with gentle, circular motions. 
Use as often as your skin demands exfoliation.

Note! The coconut oil will become hard after a day or two of sitting on the shelf. Simply run the entire (sealed) jar under a hot stream of water to loosen it up again.

options.name: 8 oz. glass jar - natural coconut w/honey
8 oz. glass jar - Buttercream cupcake w/honey
8 oz. glass jar - Creme Brulee w/honey
4 oz. glass jar - natural coconut w/honey
4 oz. glass jar - Buttercream cupcake w/honey
4 oz. glass jar - Creme Brulee w/honey

name: Sugar Kisses Lip scrub set
description:
**This is a lip scrub & balm set**

Our Natural lip scrub is an organic and all natural lip product that exfoliates, condition in one easy step! 

Use daily to eliminate flaky skin on and around the lips, and with continued use you'll notice a decrease in fine lines on and around the lips. 

Simply apply a pea-size amount to lips - works best when you close your mouth - rub gently for approximately 1 minute - use a warm washcloth or tissue to remove - or go ahead and lick it off - it's good for you! 

You'll feel a slight tingling as the circulation increases to your lips, this is what plumps the lips, adding a lovely rich natural color back to your lips! 

Now, apply your favorite Kreamie's soy lip balm - and step back and take a look - beautiful, smooth, kissable lips!

name: *limited time* Soothing soy sugar cookie eggnog sugar scrub!
description:
**Please note: when shipping this scrub to warmer climates the soy tends to melt into the sugar, this scrub IS meant to be mixed to a creamy consistency, if you'd rather have yours pre-mixed, please state that in the buyers notes**

Eggnog not only smells amazing and brings us that "kid again" feeling for the holiday season.  It also has all natural ingredients vanilla, nutmeg, cinnamon, sugar, cream etc. All bringing healthy additives to your skin through this scrub. 

With added vitamin A & E & contains glycolic acid, an alpha-hydroxy acid that is crucial for maintaining healthy skin.  The natural glycolic acid in sugar not only helps condition and moisturize skin, but protect it from toxins. Restores balance to skin’s oils. 

We use pure cane sugar (raw sugar) that is made from clarified cane juice boiled down to a crystalline solid. 

When you regularly exfoliate your skin with a sugar scrub, it becomes healthier in appearance and function. After dead skin has been exfoliated, your body’s largest organ works more efficiently to expel toxins and take in nourishment.  Skin becomes more uniform in appearance, is softer to touch, and has a radiant glow.

name: Pre-order only! 16 Oz. Soy Milkshake Candle
description:
Butt Naked - The tantalizing base note medley of granny smith apples and honeydew melon, middle notes of strawberries and pears, with hints of spice is sure to hit your nose!

This all natural soy wax candle is made from soy bean oil. Soy candles burn longer and cooler than other candles, so you will be enjoying the fragrance longer than ever! 

Longer burning candle than competitors. 

LIMITED EDITION!

name: 8 oz. Natural Soy Body Kream
description:
**New soy being made fresh, please allow a few extra days for shipping**

Soy based Body Kream is finally here!! If you have never used soy based lotion, try it! You won't regret it!

All natural Soy Body Kream in your favorite candle scents!! Smooth, non sticky, non greasy, Vegan friendly moisturizer gives you soft, supple skin with a healthy glow. Great for dry skin and for protecting your skin from the harsh environment. Smells just like the candles you love!

Natural Soy Body Kream Ingredients:  Distilled water, sunflower oil, soya oil, vegetable glycerin, stearic acid, cetyl alcohol, emulsifying wax, palmitic acid, tocopherol (vitamin E), potassium sorbate, meadowfoam oil, jojoba oil, soya milk, aloe vera, vitamin C, citric acid, Germall Plus.


"All natural everything"
NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS.

name: 8 oz. Soy Linen/Body Spray
description:
*New scents - Better than sex cake, In the mood & Satin sheets*

Transform your mood and/or your favorite room into a sensual, tranquil & serene space with this all soy 8 oz. spray bottle scented linen/body spray! 

You can spray this light mist into the air, on to linens (pillows, bedding, towels, car etc) or directly on to your body for a beautiful, skin safe scented aroma.

Beautiful scent that lasts and sprays in a light mist.

name: "Kreamie's passion" sugar scrub/body polish
description:
"Kreamie's passion" sugar scrub/body polish. 

A fresh baked scent of vanilla & caramel. All natural 100% raw Turbinado cane sugar infused with kissable sugar dust. 

Vitamin oils, coconut oil & other natural ingredients. Perfect for skin issues! Especially in this weather! 

You'll be in love with your skin after one use!

name: Kream Kisses - Natural Soy lip balm
description:
Soy based lip balm all natural, handmade keeps your lips soft, moist, healthy & kissable!

All natural 1/3 oz clear jar w/lid.

Paraben Free, food grade ingredients.

All Natural Ingredients: Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Beeswax, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Lipids, Lauryl Laurate (a vegetable derived palm), Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax

name: Kreamie's "lover in you" sugar scrub!
description:
SCENTED with lick me all over *exotic scent* oil (raspberry, jasmine, violet and fresh top notes of grapefruit & kumquat) 

Leaves your skin glowing, silky and soft!
A little bit goes a long way.

Massage into your face with gentle, circular motions. 
Use as often as your skin demands exfoliation.

Note! The coconut oil will become hard after a day or two of sitting on the shelf. Simply run the entire (sealed) jar under a hot stream of water to loosen it up again.

Made with organic coconut oil!

name: Jamaica mineral bath
description:
The mineral bath you have all been waiting for!  Minerals from Jamaica - just as in the Salt river & Milk river baths in Jamaica!

2 simple shakes into the bath from the heart jar and relax into tranquility! *be aware of the sea shells*

*Keep hydrated and boost your bath benefits with an iced glass of healthy tea at your side! 

Ingredients:
Black sea salt - Contains activated charcoal known for its detoxifying effects.

Red clay powder - cleanses, detoxifies and exfoliates the skin, leaving it refreshed, toned and rejuvenated. Relief for arthritis and muscle pain.

Organic kelp powder - provide the antioxidants that are so important for our overall health and well-being, and help alkalize, energize and nourish our cells, as they also balance our body's pH level.

Pink sea salt - Has over 32 minerals to help anti-aging; rids the body of acidic wastes that cause degeneration, peaceful, relaxed quality of energy, better moods, positive thoughts. Eases cramps, constipation, digestive disorders. Regulates and purifies critical body fluid levels. Purifying, detoxifying to the blood. Stronger libido, sexual vitality, more vigor. Essential minerals replenishes vital electrolytes.

Magnesium Sulfate - Magnesium is the 2nd most abundant element in our cells.  It helps to regulate over 325 enzymes in our body and is involved in many of our body functions, such as energy production and muscle control, as well as detoxification and helping the body to eliminate harmful toxins. Helps to detoxify & remove impurities from the skin, and is an effective “muscle soak” as it reaches those aching bones.

Vegetable Glycerine - is a natural emollient and humectant (able to retain moisture). It also possesses antibacterial properties, protects the skin from infections. Eczema and psoriasis sufferers will benefit immensely from our salts as glycerin also has a cooling effect on the skin.

Essential oil fragrance:
Embrace the feeling of complete well-being of the mind, body and spirit.   A rejuvenating medley of sweet orange blossoms, yuzu, and kumquat; followed by middle notes of juniper, fan palm and rosemary; and creates complete ecstasy with base notes of fresh sandalwood and Tahitian vanilla beans.

**NOT recommended for people who have conditions such as heart problems, high blood pressure or diabetes. If you aren’t sure whether a mineral bath is safe for you, consult your doctor first please.

Caution: Persons with an allergy to iodine should avoid using this product.

We are not responsible for reactions to this product.

name: 8 oz. Soy Jar Candle
description:
French Vanilla - A wonderful, sweet-smelling French Vanilla with rich, buttery cake batter overtones!

The soy is hand poured in an 8 ounce jar with a lid. There are no additives. No soot. Pure scent!

name: Sample soy candle favors
description:
Need favors for a party, event, birthday, wedding, baby shower, corporate event or to just give as gifts?

Why not some assorted soy candles in a 2 1/2 inch clear votive holders wrapped in your choice of colors with a pretty candle tie?

minumum of - 20 at $4.00 each.


Having an event, pop up shop etc and needs items for Gift/VIP bags? We do charge a small fee for this.  Please contact us for information.


*please allow at least 3 weeks for production, if possible*
